item.title: The Best Way to Deal with Trump
item.description: Someone you know is PERFECT for this book. It might be you. Here you are, looking at your device, reading these words, and trying to figure out the Trump thing. Or maybe you’ve figured it out, but you want to know how people like you think about it. Or maybe you’re all-in for Trump, but you need help talking to your friends or family about your Trumpism. You might be thinking this book is for you.
